p: Human iPSC derived lung organoids were generated using previously published methods (Leibel et al, 2019; Miller et al, 2019) and characterized by expression of ACE2, TMPRSS2 and alveolar cell epithelial markers (SFTPC, SFTPB, HOPX) (Tiwari et al, Manuscript under preparation). These 60D differentiated lung organoids were pretreated overnight with 25HC (5 μM) and were infected with luciferase‐expressing SARS‐CoV‐2 pseudovirus (100 μl). At 2 h post‐infection, organoids were incubated with fresh medium containing 25HC. After 24 h, luciferase activity was measured to quantify viral infection.
